name: io.github.nikicat/mcp-wallet-signer
title: EVM Wallet Signer
description: Route EVM transactions to browser wallets (MetaMask, etc.) for signing via EIP-6963

environmentVariables.name: EVM_MCP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: HTTP server port for the browser approval UI (default: 3847)

environmentVariables.name: EVM_MCP_DEFAULT_CHAIN
environmentVariables.description: Default EVM chain ID (default: 1 for Ethereum mainnet)
